title: Top selling Nintendo DS games worldwide in 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million units for 10 number of Months.
The Sales in million units is highest at Month New Super Mario Bros. and lowest at Month Super Mario 64 DS.
There is a difference of 19.74 between the maximum Month New Super Mario Bros. and minimum Month Super Mario 64 DS.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million units for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Sales in million units 30.8 is found at Month New Super Mario Bros. and the minimum is found at Super Mario 64 DS where Month is 11.06.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million units for 10 number of Months.
The Sales in million units is highest at Month New Super Mario Bros. and lowest at Month Super Mario 64 DS.
There is a difference of 19.74 between the maximum Month New Super Mario Bros. and minimum Month Super Mario 64 DS.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Sales in million units in the y axis.
Month New Super Mario Bros. has the highest Sales in million units and Super Mario 64 DS has the lowest Sales in million units.
The Sales in million units of Month New Super Mario Bros. is 2.78% larger than the minimum value at Super Mario 64 DS.
Sales in million units at Month New Super Mario Bros. is 30.8 , second place is Nintendogs at 23.96, and thirdly is Mario Kart DS at 23.6.
Overall Sales in million units has reduced over the Months.
The highest value 30.8 at New Super Mario Bros. is almost 1.7 times larger than the average value 18.11.
The Sales in million units is 181.09 if we add up values of all Months.
